pageProduct.name: OGX Coconut Milk Conditioner 750ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Indulge your senses with this exclusive blend with coconut milk, coconut oil and ultra whipped egg white proteins. This exotic formula helps add strength, elasticity, hydration and balance for healthy hair.

Why you want it... It's like a trip to the tropics in a bottle. The luxuriously creamy, hydrating blend helps leave your hair feeling moisturized, glowing, and super soft.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals.

Size: 750mL

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Albumen, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycol Stearate, Glycol Distearate, Ceteareth-20, Isopropyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Citric Acid, Cyclopentasiloxane, Panthenol, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate, Tetrasodium EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance (Parfum).

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
